Title: Requires newly certified teachers to be trained in the use of an epinephrine auto-injector
Summary: Requires newly certified teachers to be trained in the use of an epinephrine auto-injector; requires such teachers to be certified within 3 months of date of hire.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring newly certified teachers to receive instruction in the use of an epinephrine auto-injector
